projet1.name: Instafacts
projet1.description: Python script that generates a random fact about a random animals and creates an instagram reels using llms and MoviePy and automatically uploads them using instagram's API.

projet2.name: N-body problem simulation
projet2.description: Approximation of the N-body problem's numeric solution using rust.

projet3.name: Dash++
projet3.description: Fast ClI tool to get ovelapping segments. Moslty to be used in population's genetic analysis.

projet4.name: Gym Buddy
projet4.description: Flutter app that helps you keep track of your workouts and your progress. Gym Buddy also lets you share your progress with your friends.

projet5.name: InstaNews
projet5.description: Python sofware to generate news from web sources and create an instagram reels using finetunes tts models and llms. Automatically creates instagram reels and uploads them using instagram's API.
